name: Handbook fo Clinical Chiropractic Care Book
descr: The second edition of the Handbook of Clinical Chiropractic Care is a concise, quick - access handbook that covers the more commom conditions seen in a chiropractic practice. Where possible, and evidence based approach is presented, but it must be understood that a purely evidence based practice is impossible to achieve in any form of health care. Instead the clinician must use the best available evidence, clinical experience, and a "pinch" of intuition to manage his/her practice.
